website_summaries.verdict: This comprehensive kit includes items for grooming, feeding, sleeping, and play.
pros: Nail clippers, a brush, toys, bowls, and a bed are just some of the items included
Offers a wide variety of things to try with your pup to give you an idea of what they like
cons: Not all pets are okay with the "glove" brush, and it doesn't work well on short-haired animals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This puppy kit is perfect and better than expected. All the items are top quality. The blanket is soft, perfect for a blanket to place into a crate. The leash and collar are sturdy. A little big for a puppy, but I suppose it depends on the dog. The bowls are the right size. Everything else is awesome! will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gilin

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for the price
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple of things in here that most pet owners would find to be completely useless, but if you were to purchase all the other items separately, you'd spend much more than the price of the bundle. The one thing it's missing that we felt was absolutely essential for a puppy: a Nylabone (or a chew toy of similar material).
customer_reviews.author: Giddyup

customer_reviews.title: Torn
customer_reviews.text: The squeaky duck toy was ripped when we received it. Easy to sew up or wrap some twine around though. Everything else that came with the package was in good condition and seems to be of durable materials. Would recommend but hopefully the toy won't be torn.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This training kit has everything you will need to welcome your new puppy except a towel and puppy chow! The leash was a little to big for my pup, but as she grows I’m sure it will fit just right! She loves her toys! Everything looks and feels durable. Had my pup for more than a month and all items holding up very well! I will update as time progresses! Recommended purchase for value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about just buy it. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is a long over due. This kit is the best value for your money and simply a life saver. Not sure how I would have been able to get through my first couple of weeks without this kit. I still can't believe how many pieces you get in the kit. The quality of each of the items are top notch. I read other reviews about the durability of the toys. Keep in mind just like any other toys in this price range it might not last for ever. However it gets the job done for a new puppy. Stop thinking about it just buy it. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CCS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great purchase! Only things that are a downer are that the collar is too big for a puppy, there’s no tooth paste to go with the tooth brush and the duck’s neck broke open within the first 2 days. Other than that totally worth it! The blanket is my puppies go to, she loves all the ropes and rope balls and i
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for what you pay there’s a lot of stuff and a lot of it comes in handy. The “dog bed” is actually just a blanket not big or thick or anything but it is really soft 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great Start
customer_reviews.text: These items were great to get me started with my puppy. The silver bowls, and collar are too large for a "puppy". The night flasher never worked and the duck was a favorite with my puppy but didn't last past a week. The blanket was a great snuggle component and was very soft. The balls were durable and a favorite! They kept him occupied for expanded periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time pet ower
customer_reviews.text: Great for first time pet owner. The grooming supplies are not as sturdy as I would like. The rope toys alone could be worth 25 dollars - high quality and durable. Nice to have 2 regular dog bowls and also some for on the go walks and traveling. Event impressed with how the blanket has held up with several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Game

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Tomorrow I’m going to get my new puppy. This is an amazing starter pack for a dog. I love to go walking to the foldable bowls are nice to put into a bag. The ropes are not made cheap. I don’t believe a puppy can eat through these. The light for her collar is smart to have with less light. Overall great pack, I believe it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Bri Gallman

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just not for small pups.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this set for my puppy and could not use most of the items. The bowl was too big for her, the chew toys was too tuff and I had to order softer ones, and the leash was way too big. I love the set I just think it’s better suited for a an older dog after its first year. Definitely put it up for her, for later.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Poole

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I am getting a puppy in about a week and this pack had pretty much everything you need to get started it is fantastic. Everything seems durable and long lasting so can't wait to use some of the items and put them to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Good new puppy starter pack
customer_reviews.text: This kit has been GREAT! It comes with a lot of the essentials needed for a new puppy. I have been recommending it to my friends as well who are getting or have new puppies. The bowls are great as well as some of the toys. I would recommend adding another ball, like a tennis ball but my puppy loves the duck. Good starter pack
customer_reviews.author: BBuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new pup parents!
customer_reviews.text: I've used every item in this kit and my puppy has loved all the toys and caries the blanket everywhere. So glad I got this kit in prep for my new puppy and 2 months in I can't recomend all the items highly enough! Definitely my go to gift for nee puppy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: good kit
customer_reviews.text: I love I was able to buy all of this together. If I had to pay individually, it would have been more than the cost of this kit. My dog chewed up the duck and treat ball within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shaurona Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product combo for this price!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely worth it . Great started kit for a puppy. initially thought they look cheap but no. Each individual item is awesome. the rope toys are a big hit with our puppy!! your saving like 50% off list price if you buy them individually. A must have combo for new puppy owners !!
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: all the basics for a new furry addition to your home
customer_reviews.text: toys are on the smaller size which would be great for a puppy, bowls work great and are a decent size. the treat bag is great for always having treats on hand during training or walks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Overall the package will be put to use. Everything seems to be pretty good quality. The only thing that was disappointing, is the package says for a "SMALL" dog, but the collar that was sent was for a medium to large dog. Good thing I had already ordered a collar with the puppy's name and my phone number otherwise we would not have a collar that fit for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Combination of Dog Items
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grand daughter's first puppy. There are so many things in this kit that came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy..all the items were great and what's needed for a new puppy..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful items. Especially treat dispenser ball
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sis who’s (at 65) never had a puppy before. She loved it noting that many of the items were ones she researched and was going to buy. The collar is too big for small breed dog, even when grown. However, she’s using it for another purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great, reasonably priced starter pack for first time dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia C. Hozella

customer_reviews.title: Good puppy bundle
customer_reviews.text: Good bundle of puppy stuff! Wish the collar was smaller and it came with another toy but overall was impressed with this purchase! My boy loves the blanket it came with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price and pretty good quality
customer_reviews.author: Rory Stallard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and selection at this price
customer_reviews.text: I rarerly write a review but I have to say this starter kit has the best price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Some false advertisement, but good buy
customer_reviews.text: The "toothbrush" advertised in the product description is actually just another brush/massager for the dog's head. The wire brush came with the packaging already ripped open, but it didn't look dirty or used. Other than that, it's a good buy and has helped us prepare to bring home our puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: great variety for the price. Perfect puppy starter kit. Good quality and everything was perfectly packed individually in their own plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved by all my dogs, not just the puppy. Pretty sturdy and durable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Breezy1

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of items!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for your new puppy in one easy box!
customer_reviews.author: Vannah

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with items.
customer_reviews.text: Think it’s great products for price. All items were great, not “cheaply made.” Ropes are heavy and still intact (depending on puppy). The ball and duck both make noise plus my puppy loves his blanket. Travel bowls are very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of items needed for new puppies.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase for a beginner of a new puppy had everything we need in a nut shell 5 months later still using the products. Great durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dina X.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit, stuffed animal not very safe: it ripped open when playing rough
customer_reviews.author: silviasusana

customer_reviews.title: Ok kit, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s overpriced kit.. a lot of stuff is actually not needed as a ‘starter kit’. One can buy the essentials at much lower price in many retail outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Ranga_cgo

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as expected and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The travel bowls are quite small as well as the brush and comb but other than that I'm still please for the price. It arrived on time and toys are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Palafox

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Got great use and value out of all items. The massaging/brushing glove is too big but I have small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivanj2

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit. Collar is big
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Pretty nice for a starter kit for the price. I wish you could choose the size of the collar. As the one provided is for a larger dog, it’s too big for a shih tzu
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I just got a puppy and it comes with everything I would need for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey_Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for a puppy! My pup loves all of her toys! The grooming kit is good too! Definitely a great puppy starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came neatly package everything arrived in great condition. Really worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: great products
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, i purchased it for my lab puppy i’ve used everything would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Doran

customer_reviews.title: Would and probably will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kit for our pup, collar is a great size for our moms Boxer and the toys are so cute. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Tarlton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: He loved the toys and the blanket is so soft he loves it! Great price for everything included!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: suit for my new puppy :)
customer_reviews.text: Everything is we needed and is great quality. Pup loves them. highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Gerrite

customer_reviews.title: Save a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: I just got a puppy and this deal was to good..I love my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lapeira

customer_reviews.title: Great for new puppies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new puppies. Great quality and what a bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabra Nelkin

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much all you need to be a puppy parent
customer_reviews.author: caycie

product_meta.title: AONESY Puppy Starter Kits for Small Dog, 24pcs New pup Dog Starter kit Gift Set,Includes:Dog Toys/Dog Bed Blankets/Dog Grooming Tool/Puppy Training Supplies/Dog Leashes Accessories/Feeding Supplies
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT & FOR THE BEST PRICE: 24 in 1 puppy/small dog daily essential kit. Contains a pet blanket, a dog leash and collar set, 2 steel dog bowl, a pet grooming glove, a dog nail clippers, 2 dog travel bowls, 6 dog toys, 1dog tag, 1 toothbrush, 1 dog treat bag, 1 comb and 5 roll garbage bags.

GROOMING - Grooming tools include grooming glove and dog nail clippers.The nail clipper is made up of sharp stainless steel blades. This flexible, slip-on grooming gloves Brush Away Dirt, Grime, Dander And Loose Hair From Your Dog.Unlock protection prevent children from using it.

WALKING & TRAVEL - High Quality Reflective Dog Leash 5 feet long with a soft padded handle for an easy grip - makes walk time much more enjoyable!Adjustable dog collar range is 14.5”-22”. Collapsible pet bowl is 5 inches wide, 2.1 inches height, each bowl holds up to 12 fluid ounces of water or 1.5 cups of pet food - 0.5 inches when collapsed - simply Pop-Up and fold away.Waste/Pop Bag Dispenser - Leak-proof Bags For Safe, Sanitary Handling. Includes 1 Roll Of 15 Waste Bags.

EAT & SLEEP - Set of 2 dog food bowls, 2 dog travel bowls, Perfect for Your Pets up to 70lbs. Dog blanket: length 40.9" width 30.7" (104*78cm), High Quality Soft Flannel dog bed to keep your dog warm, comfortable and happy. it's machine washable.

ENTERTAINMENT - Three different puppy toys(rope toy, squeak toy and ball toy),will take away boredom from your dog's life, helping curb anxiety and better channelize your puppy's excess of energy. Dog toys can help with teeth cleaning, release dogs energy and reduce stress， help to redirect bad biting behavior。
